definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Today, they speak Gujarati, dress and eat just like the locals.
sentences.chinese: 今天，他们说古吉拉特语，穿的和吃的跟当地人一样。

sentences.english: Should be willing to relocate to Ahmedabad, Gujarat.
sentences.chinese: 如果愿意搬迁到艾哈迈达巴德，古吉拉特。

sentences.english: ARabari woman in Gujarat visits the grave of an ancestor.
sentences.chinese: 古吉拉特的一位拉巴尼妇女拜谒先人的陵墓。

sentences.english: A region of western India bordering on the Arabian Sea.
sentences.chinese: 古吉拉特印度西部一地区，与阿拉伯海相邻。
